Summary: 4 tiny white dots very, very high up
divs: Sighting DetailsHalf the sky was full of chemtrails and the other a beautiful blue this afternoon. I was the sky a lot to monitor the clouds. I was told there was an airshow being held this weekend and did notice more planes than usual. But what i saw as i looked around shocked me. I saw three very tiny white dot's extremely high up in the sky. This side of the sky was the all blue part. I noticed the three dot's were equal distance from each other forming a 'v' shape. My first thought was "star's?" Couldn't be- it was day light. Second thought was satellites but again, no. I knew they were way, way too high up to be a plane or what not. I then noticed a 4th one in front of the formation but of greater distance away and towards the left. I took video aand photo's but after the last picture was taken i couldn't see them any more. I have tried hard to zoom in on the photo's to show proof but my cell phone isn't the best.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Everett
There were no other sightings in Everett on or around September 1st 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
